mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ums_admin (admin_name, `password`, icon_id, email, nick_name, note, create_time, sys_id, salt, `state`) values (#{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ums_admin set admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_id = #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_name, `password`, icon_id, email, nick_name, note, create_time, sys_id, salt, `state` from ums_admin where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select admin_id, admin_name, `password`, icon_id, email, nick_name, note, create_time, sys_id, salt, `state` from ums_admin

select ums_role.role_id, ums_role.role_name, ums_role.description,ums_role.available, ums_role.admin_count, ums_role.sort, ums_role.sys_id from ums_admin LEFT JOIN ums_admin_role ON ums_admin.admin_id=ums_admin_role.admin_id LEFT JOIN ums_role on ums_admin_role.role_id=ums_role.role_id where ums_role.sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ums_admin=#{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ums_permission.permission_id, ums_permission.permission_name, ums_permission.permission_desc, ums_permission.create_time, ums_permission.update_time, ums_permission.sys_id from ums_admin LEFT JOIN ums_admin_role ON ums_admin.admin_id=ums_admin_role.admin_id LEFT JOIN ums_role on ums_admin_role.role_id=ums_role.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_role_permission ON ums_role.role_id = ums_role_permission.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_permission ON ums_role_permission.permission_id = ums_permission.permission_id where ums_role.sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ums_admin=#{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
